Ok after meditating a while our fellow living, I felt some how guilty 
of t=
hat happened. I admit the part that I have with and I feel that I 
have to =
care more of this RPG. In order to improve our situation 
here, I have foll=
ow suggestion in order to keep things running:

1. If a player is waitting =
an answer for another player and that 
answer didnt come, I strongly sugges=
t that you char focus in another 
player.

2. In case that your char is stu=
ck in a situation, move him/her in 
order to you can interac with actives o=
r more receptives players.


Also Stac suggest follow:

3. If somoene is go=
ing to be involved, they need to make that 
commitment to post on a regular=
 basis.

eep 
the story moving and not leave other players who are involved in the

est that you try

ng.

I also  want to=
